Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You want to know what I'm doing? Isn't
it obvious? I'm taking a break.
<PAGE>
You're lucky, actually, running into me
right now. Really lucky!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I was just starting to feel thirsty, so
I was going to go get some tea.
<PAGE>
You don't have anything to do, right?
I'm feeling pretty good today, I'll take
you along with me if you like!
<PAGE>
Come on.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT>
Hey, what's wrong? Come on, get a move
on!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up? It's my treat, so you don't
have to hold back! Eat, come on.
I don't like being told what to do.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, you followed me here happily
enough! If you didn't want to come, why
didn't you say so to start with?
<PAGE>
Someone who can't clearly tell other
people what they are feeling doesn't
have any right to complain.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Boy, you've really killed the mood. I'm
surprised at you, honestly. If you don't
want to be here, go on, get going.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Right, I'll just get back to enjoying my
tea-time.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I invited you here. There's no need to
thank me.
<PAGE>
Having a woman pay for food or drink
while she is eating with me goes against
everything I stand for.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You think that makes me kind? No, I'm
just doing what anyone would do! Come
on, let's eat.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew, that was great! I'd better get
going, anyway. We part ways here!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
It looks like you had a good time. I'll
invite you out again sometime. Look
forward to it!
